Title: SharpUPnP
Description: SharpUPnP is an attempt to create an UPnP library for .NET, mainly focused on functionalities that are related with NAT devices and NAT traversal behavior. The goal of this project is to offer developers a managed-code alternative to the COM Library that is shipped with Windows.
HomeWiki:
SharpUPnP is a project started by Marco Minerva at December 21st, 2007.

SharpUPnP is an attempt to create an UPnP library for .NET, mainly focused on functionalities that are related with NAT devices and NAT traversal behavior. The goal of this project is to offer developers a managed-code alternative to the COM Library that is shipped with Windows.

Latest available version: SharpUpnp 1.0.

System requirements:
  • .NET Framework 3.5
  • Visual C# 2008 Express Edition or Visual Studio 2008
  • An operating system that is supported by Visual Studio 2008:
    • Windows Vista® (x86 & x64) - all editions except Starter Edition
    • Windows® XP (x86 & x64) with Service Pack 2 or later - all editions except Starter Edition
    • Windows Server® 2003 (x86 & x64) with Service Pack 1 or later (all editions)
    • Windows Server 2003 R2 (x86 and x64) or later (all editions)
  • An UPnP compliant device

Latest available version: SharpUpnp 1.0.
